alert.note: Alert for Kandiyohi; Pope; Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:55PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pope, southwestern Stearns and northeastern Kandiyohi Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Belgrade, or 24 miles north of Willmar, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Belgrade around 600 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Paynesville. This includes U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 142 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and west central Minnesota.
